item.title: AI Strategy & Implementation
item.description: I provide AI strategy and implementation services. If you think I can help you, contact me at erik.wiffin@gmail.com. Services AI Strategy: I will work with you to help you define your company’s AI Strategy. Zero to One: Proof of Concept Implementation: I will develop a proof of concept to validate a product idea or lay a foundation for your existing engineering team. One to One Million: AI in production: I will provision the infrastructure required for you to run your AI in production, covering everything from hardware requirements, to logging and monitoring to prevent “model drift” over time.
